alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 6:23PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lee County through 700 PM EDT... At 622 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Southwest Florida Airport, or near Fort Myers, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Myers, Lehigh Acres, Southwest Florida Airport, Page Park, Page Field Airport, Fort Myers Villas, and Estero. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
